restaurantName: Ristorante Da Anita - Chalet Prà delle Nasse
description: This family-run restaurant is surrounded by views of the Dolomites that are particularly impressive from the outdoor terrace in summer. A historic culinary stalwart among San Martino di Castrozza restaurants, Prà delle Nasse focuses on regional mountain cuisine, although a few more personalised dishes also feature on the menu. The desserts include the grandmother’s traditional tarts alongside more contemporary options.
